name: Vast Desert - Gold Golgonda
text: All "Sprigguns" Xyz Monsters on the field gain 1000 ATK. You can only use each of the following effects of "Vast Desert - Gold Golgonda" once per turn. If you control no "Sprigguns" Xyz Monsters: You can discard 1 "Sprigguns" card; Special Summon 1 "Sprigguns" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck. If a face-up Xyz Monster(s) you control leaves the field by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; it cannot attack for the rest of this turn (even if this card leaves the field).
